name: YogaStudio
0:
”Alexa, open Yoga Studio and start for 30 minutes”
”Alexa, open Yoga Studio and start for 10 minutes”
”Alexa, open Yoga Studio and start for 60 minutes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yoga studio
des:
Introducing the simplest, fastest way to start a yoga practice from the comfort of your own home. 
- Just say "Alexa, open Yoga Studio and start for 30 minutes" and be on your way with a Vinyasa Flow. 
- Classes are organized by time and you can choose from 4 durations: 10 minutes, 20 minutes, 30 minutes, or 60 minutes. 
- Yoga Studio will choose a random class of the duration you ask for.
If you're interested in yoga for fitness, yoga for meditation or to be a little calmer and more mindful Yoga Studio is the app for you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
